name: Fatal Fulmination
title: Consecrated Scorpion: Fatal Fulmination
desc: Lifeforms are governed by the laws of evolution, Consecrated Beasts exploited these rules by being fortunate enough to discover a long-dead carcass of a greater being before any of their competition ever did.
in_play_description: When your Consecrated Scorpion, who has this card equipped, is on the field and after you play Bonecruncher's Energy Block: Draw 1 card, then create 1 Bonecruncher's Energy Block and randomly place it into your deck.

attributes.source: Reward for accepting the Tavern Challenge against the Consecrated Scorpion at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives in a Friendly Fracas

skills.desc:
When played: Create 1 Bonecruncher's Energy Block and place it into your Hand.
When your Consecrated Scorpion, who has this card equipped, is on the field and after you play Bonecruncher's Energy Block: Draw 1 card, then create 1 Bonecruncher's Energy Block and randomly place it into your deck.
(You must have Consecrated Scorpion in your deck to add this card to your deck)
